_sText:
This is the fix version of ba_jail_assassinator_remake. Due to the update some textures got broken and I needed to fix it so here it is.

Orange Box update log:
- Fixed most of the bugs.
- Nodrawed the most of non visible textures.
- Removed 1 secret and changed one.
- Added a disco floor(as you can see on the last screenshot)
- Changed 3 of the 6 songs
- Changed some textures

------

Map content:
- Big cage
- Cells(open automatically after 1 minute)
- Medic
- Football
- Pool with toilets
- Sauna
- Solitary
- Disco
- Playground
- Kitchen
- Last request room
- Store with a secret room
- Secrets
- Tower to control the terrorists
- 64 spawns(32 T's and 32 ct's)
Some notes:
- To open the cells, you need to climb the tower, where the button to open the cells is.

--------

Hope you enjoy playing on the map, as I enjoyed making it =D
Rate and comment please =)
